content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello James Smith, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I am willing to negotiate with you on the rental price. However, I would like to clarify that the apartment is only 25 square meters. I would like to emphasize that I am a landlord and I am looking to maximize my gains. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 100 Euros per month. Can we have a written contract?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Certainly, James. I can provide you with a written contract for the rental of the apartment. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have one question, can I move in on the 1st of next month?

Also, I would like to have a move-in date of the 1st of next month. Can you confirm that?

I would like to move in on the 1st of next month. Is that possible?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Yes, James, you can move in on the 1st of next month. I can confirm that the move-in date is the 1st of next month. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
